Content: A person has received a life sentence with hard labour, by the order of the Colombo High Court, for the possession of 2.18 grams of heroin and smuggling. The verdict was delivered by the Colombo High Court Judge on a person living in Borella. The suspect was arrested from the Peliyagoda area in a raid conducted by the coastal Police, in 2010. The Attorney General had filed the case against the suspect for the possession and smuggling of drugs. After a long-drawn court case, the suspect was imprisoned for life.
